Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2008 10:22PM Renee07 wrote: Hi=I'm Renee.  I just started my radiation today.  The first treatment was scary, but honestly it was quick and painless.  I need to buy some cream and put it on my skin.  I worry about the fatigue and the skin changes alot, but I know that this is something that I must do so that my recurrence rate will be lower.  I owe it to my kids and to myself.  I am glad to join the January girls so that I can read how everyone else is doing!!
Posts.Title: Anyone starting Rads in January? Barbie7 Miss_Lolli
